trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Paradise
There were no other sightings in Paradise on or around March 20th 1963
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving home along I5- from Paradise CA... During storm... Looked up in sky and was noticing a bright orb in the clouds. It was during the supermoon. It was basically motionless. I captured it on video and it seemed to drop a sparkly object into the clouds.
